item.title: Adept
item.description:
Adept on Twitter

‚Äú1/7 We built a new model! It‚Äôs called Action Transformer (ACT-1) and we taught it to use a bunch of software tools. In this first video, the user simply types a high-level request and ACT-1 does the rest. Read on to see more examples ‚¨áÔ∏è‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/AdeptAILabs/status/1570144499187453952

source: Best of Twitter - September 12-25, 2022

item.title: Erik Hoel
item.description:
Erik Hoel on Twitter

‚Äú2. The lesser-known cousin to Fermi‚Äôs Paradox (‚ÄúWhere are all the aliens?‚Äù), the Sapient Paradox asks ‚ÄúWhy were we stuck in prehistory?‚Äù Ritual mammoth houses made of bones are some of the earliest structures at 15,000 BC. G√∂bekli Tepe is 9,000 BC! Where‚Äôd ~190,000 years go??‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/erikphoel/status/1567153092986109955

source: Best of Twitter - September 12-25, 2022

item.title: Erik Hoel
item.description:
Erik Hoel on Twitter

‚Äú22. So maybe the Sapient Paradox is because we were in a ‚Äúgossip trap‚Äù of raw social power, and everything went to reputation management, and humans lived in separate ‚Äúhigh schools‚Äù for hundreds of thousands of years until forced to invent civilization by Dunbar‚Äôs number‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/erikphoel/status/1567161851984633856

source: Best of Twitter - September 12-25, 2022
